text:
Architecting applications to communicate with
one another through proxies and custom code

But Amazon VPC Lattice makes it easy to connect,
secure, and monitor communication

between your applications with support for
instances, containers, and serverless compute.

This fully managed service allows you to define
communication between applications,
automating a wide range of tasks,

including service discovery,
traffic routing, and access authorization.
Automate connectivity across VPCs and accounts

Improve your security posture with context-specific
authorization and request-level authentication

Scale compute and network resources automatically
to support high-bandwidth HTTP, HTTPs, and

Amazon VPC Lattice simplifies application
networking,

giving you more time to focus on building innovative
features that transform your business.
Start using Amazon VPC Lattice today!
